p.p: When using a single SNOMED CT code that describes a type of End of Life document then:

li.strong: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK EoLDocumentType subset with subset original id 47701000000132

p.strong: This is a preliminary set of values, for the full list consult the latest published version of the Snomed Subset ID: 47701000000132

p.p: When using a compositional expression consisting of multiple codes from SNOMED CT that describes a type of CDA document then:

li.strong: A code from the SNOMED CT UK Correspondence Document type subset with subset original id 44041000000135
A code from the SNOMED CT UK Correspondence CareSetting type subset with subset original id 43971000000130
Further guidance on the format of the compositional expression is available on request.
